definitions.text: any mechanical or electrical device that transmits or modifies energy to perform or assist in the performance of human tasks

examples: the boxer was a magnificent fighting machine

definitions.text: an intricate organization that accomplishes its goals efficiently
a device for overcoming resistance at one point by applying force at some other point
a group that controls the activities of a political party
examples: he was endorsed by the Democratic machine

definitions.text: a motor vehicle with four wheels; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine
examples: he needs a car to get to work

definitions.text: turn, shape, mold, or otherwise finish by machinery

examples: The Americans were machining while others still hand-made cars
